title: Proofpoint
extract: Proofpoint. Proofpoint provides cloud-based email security, eDiscovery and compliance solutions. Its patented technologies and on-demand delivery system protect against spam and viruses, safeguard privacy, encrypt sensitive information, and archive messages for management and discovery.
extract_html: Proofpoint. Proofpoint provides cloud-based email security, eDiscovery and compliance solutions. Its patented technologies and on-demand delivery system protect against spam and viruses, safeguard privacy, encrypt sensitive information, and archive messages for management and discovery.
